member.name: WS_OPERATION_DESCRIPTION.versionInfo
member.summary: Defines the version information. Currently value is 1.

member.name: WS_OPERATION_DESCRIPTION.inputMessageDescription
member.summary: The description of incoming WS_MESSAGE for a given service operation.

member.name: WS_OPERATION_DESCRIPTION.outputMessageDescription
member.summary: The description of outgoing WS_MESSAGE for a given service operation. For one way operations this should be NULL.

summary.para: Provides additional flags for the in message of the operation. See for a list of flags. If no flags are needed, this may be 0.
is not applicable to style operations. The input parameter must be with type of .
Provides additional flags for the out message of the operation. See for a list of flags. If out message is not available, or no flags are needed, this may be 0.
is not applicable to style operations. The output parameter must be with type of .

member.name: WS_OPERATION_DESCRIPTION.parameterCount
member.summary: The number of parameters on the given service operation.

member.name: WS_OPERATION_DESCRIPTION.parameterDescription
member.summary: An array defining the individual parameters.

member.name: WS_OPERATION_DESCRIPTION.stubCallback
member.summary: A pointer to the stub function for the given operation to which the service model will delegate to do the service operation call. This will be NULL for proxies.
